algorithms.imageProcessing

Interface IEdgeExtractor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractEdgeExtractor, EdgeExtractor, EdgeExtractorWithJunctions

    public interface IEdgeExtractor
    interface for edge extractor. the input should be an image which has already been processed by the CannyEdgeFilter to have lines that are only 1 pixel wide.
    Author:
    nichole

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<PairIntArray> findEdges()
      find the edges and return as a list of points.
      GreyscaleImage getImage() 
      void overrideEdgeSizeLowerLimit(int length) 
      void removeShorterEdges(boolean doRemove) 

    • Method Detail

      • findEdges

        java.util.List<PairIntArray> findEdges()
        find the edges and return as a list of points. The method uses a DFS search through all points in the image with values > 0 to link adjacent sequential points into edges. As a side effect, the method also populates member variables edgeJunctionMap and outputIndexLocatorForJunctionPoints.
        Returns:

      • getImage

        GreyscaleImage getImage()

      • overrideEdgeSizeLowerLimit

        void overrideEdgeSizeLowerLimit(int length)

      • removeShorterEdges

        void removeShorterEdges(boolean doRemove)
